name: A Cup to the Moon
description:
"Can I reach the Moon by building a tower of cups?" - thought an avid drinker as they enjoyed their favorite drink under the moonlight.
Drink, stack up cups, build up a tower and find out for yourself how achievable is this reverie.

Credits

Programming: Daniel Queiroz Porto

Art: Raniery Seles Nardy, Bruno Mutt

Game Design: Jéssica Della Flor, Rafael Arrivabene

Sound Design: Pedro Rodrigues
